mapper.delete: DELETE TB_FEAM_EGER_AW_CALC_BAS /* 엔지니어수당계산기본 */ WHERE 1 = 1 AND BASE_YM = #{baseYm} /* 기준년월 */ AND FEE_CD IN ('W060001', 'W060002', 'W060003', 'W060004', 'W060005', 'W060006', 'W060007', 'W060008', 'W060010', 'W060011', 'W060012') /* 수수료코드 */ AND FEE_TCNT_DV_CD = #{feeTcntDvCd} /* 수수료차수구분코드 */
